"A.P.241/9/23/10:00":
"It's been a long while since we last met.
You're looking a bit tense over there, are you okay?"

"Don't worry about it.
We've been preparing for a long
time to welcome you back."

"Well, it's kind of hard to not get
nervous about this after all."

"Rest Assured!
I'll keep supporting you to the best of my abilities!"

"<%me>, Matoi...
This, is a strategic operation to save [Persona]."
